content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Boiler at position(-34.5, 30.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Boiler (position -34.5, 30.0) with status NOT_CONNECTED
- Pipe group (position -36.5, 29.5) connected to the boiler

### Steam Engine at position(-29.5, 30.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Steam engine (position -29.5, 30.5) with status NOT_CONNECTED
- Small electric poles (multiple positions around -29.5, 30.5) that are not connected to a power network

### Offshore Pump at position(-10.5, 25.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Offshore pump (position -10.5, 25.5) with status WORKING
- Pipe group (position -10.5, 23.5) connected to the offshore pump

### Lab at position(-23.5, 29.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Lab (position -23.5, 29.5) with status NO_POWER

### Pipe Groups
- Pipe group (position -24.5, -51.5) with status EMPTY
- Pipe group (position -10.5, 23.5) with fluid system 63084 and status FULL_OUTPUT
- Pipe group (position -3.5, 24.5) with status EMPTY
- Pipe group (position -36.5, 28.5) with status EMPTY

### Electricity Group at position(-27.5, -2.5)
Consists of multiple small electric poles (various positions) with voltage 0.

### Furnaces
- Furnace (position 5.0, -73.0) with status NO_INGREDIENTS
- Furnace (position -18.0, -49.0) with status NO_INGREDIENTS

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to entity connections
- Ensure that the boiler and steam engine are properly connected to a water source and power network to avoid the NOT_CONNECTED status.
- Check the connections of the offshore pump to ensure it is properly linked to the fluid system.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Errors related to entity retrieval
- Verify the position of the entity you are trying to retrieve. The error indicates that there was an attempt to get an offshore pump at a position where none exists. Always check the map for the correct entity locations before executing commands.
